detail_desc: Jumper in a textured knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a textured knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut trenchcoat in soft imitation suede with notch lapels and a loose yoke. Detachable tie belt at the waist and discreet pockets in the side seams. No fasteners. Unlined. The pocket linings are made from recycled polyester.

Coat in a nylon and cotton weave with a tie belt at the waist, pointed collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves and diagonal welt pockets with a flap. Single back vent. Unlined. The polyester content of the pocket lining is partly recycled.
Shirt in sturdy cotton denim with a tapered waist. Pointed collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Short coat in soft faux shearling with large notch lapels with a buttonhole, concealed press-studs down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders and wide, straight sleeves. Recycled polyester lining.

Short coat in soft faux shearling with large notch lapels with a buttonhole, concealed press-studs down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders and wide, straight sleeves. Recycled polyester lining.
Relaxed-fit dungarees in cotton twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a three-part chest pocket and front and back pockets. Press-studs at the sides and tapered legs.
Jersey-lined trousers in cotton twill with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, a zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and straight legs.
Jersey-lined trousers in cotton twill with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, a zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and straight legs.

Cargo joggers in washed cotton canvas. Casual style in a relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, and bellows pockets with a flap on the legs. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees.
Short, straight-cut nightdress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.

Derby shoes in imitation patent leather with lacing at the front and chunky platform soles. Jersey linings and insoles. Height of soles 5.5 cm.
Fitted top in textured jersey with a slight sheen. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and long puff sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, and tapered legs.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in mesh with gathers in the sides.
Cropped top in washed cotton jersey with small sparkly stones on the front. Narrow ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with concealed buttons down the front, a stand-up collar with decorative gathers at the front and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist with gathered sections front and back, narrow elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Flared skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with concealed buttons down the front, a stand-up collar with decorative gathers at the front and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist with gathered sections front and back, narrow elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Flared skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with concealed buttons down the front, a stand-up collar with decorative gathers at the front and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist with gathered sections front and back, narrow elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Flared skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with concealed buttons down the front, a stand-up collar with decorative gathers at the front and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist with gathered sections front and back, narrow elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Flared skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with concealed buttons down the front, a stand-up collar with decorative gathers at the front and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist with gathered sections front and back, narrow elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Flared skirt. Unlined.

Dungarees in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with a three-part chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and front and back pockets. Fake fly, press-studs at the sides, jersey-lined legs and hems lined in a patterned weave.
Skirt in soft, washed cotton denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and V-shaped seam front and back. Visible fly with press-studs, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

High-waisted jeans in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort. Relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative, V-shaped seam at the top, zip fly with buttons, side and back pockets and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Bow tie in imitation leather.
Metal hair clip decorated with a large bow in soft velvet.
Metal hair clip decorated with a large bow in soft velvet.
Chunky metal chain anklet. Adjustable length approx. 20-27 cm.
Short-sleeved Henley shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, button placket and small fabric appliqué at the hem.
Short-sleeved Henley shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, button placket and small fabric appliqué at the hem.
Short-sleeved Henley shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, button placket and small fabric appliqué at the hem.

Dungarees in soft, stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, a chest pocket and front and back pockets, buttons at the sides and slim legs. The cotton content of the dungarees is partly recycled.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a high collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Jersey trims at the cuffs and hem and a zipped chest pocket in contrasting colour woven fabric. Gently rounded and longer at the back. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Lace dress with a gentle V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top. Concealed zip at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Cotton jersey lining.

Lace dress with a gentle V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top. Concealed zip at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Cotton jersey lining.
Rib-knit hat with a wide, foldover hem.
Rib-knit hat with a wide, foldover hem.
Elastic waist belt covered in gathered imitation leather with a metal fastener at the front.
Relaxed-fit, V-neck T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a seam down the back.
Relaxed-fit, V-neck T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a seam down the back.
Relaxed-fit, V-neck T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a seam down the back.
Flared skirt in an airy, lightly crinkled weave made from a cotton blend with a concealed zip at the back and billowing vertical flounces. Lined.
Wide, braided waist belt in imitation suede with elastic at the back and a metal clasp at the front. Width 6 cm.
Belt in imitation suede with movable metal details and a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Thong briefs in lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and string back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and string back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and string back.
Straight-cut top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Straight-cut top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Flat leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles.
Flat leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket cotton denim shorts in a slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist and a zip fly and button.

Straight-cut jacket in grained imitation leather with a collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with an adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist, flap chest pockets and pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Straight-cut jacket in grained imitation leather with a collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with an adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist, flap chest pockets and pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Short dress in mesh with a sequin-embroidered tiered skirt. Deep V-neck with a wrapover top and concealed press-stud at the front, and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounced trim. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in felted fabric with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The lining is made from recycled polyester.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in felted fabric with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The lining is made from recycled polyester.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in felted fabric with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The lining is made from recycled polyester.

Slightly longer, lightly padded bomber jacket in satin made from recycled polyester with a ribbed, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Diagonal welt pockets with a press-stud at the front, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Straight-cut, long-sleeved shirt jacket in a washed, organic cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a visible seam down the back. Chest pocket, patch front pockets and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
